doc.field: Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Subseries I.D. International Political and Religious Leaders Hosted by Appeal of Conscience Foundation
Subseries I.D. International Political and Religious Leaders Hosted by Appeal of Conscience Foundation

This subseries contains audio cassette tapes, sound and video recordings, correspondence, images, photographs, newspaper clippings, photographs, schedules, and reports pertaining to the international political and religious leaders that meet with, or were hosted by the Appeal of Conscience Foundation during their visit to the United States. Delegations came from the following countries: Bosnia and Herzegovina, China, Serbia, Yugoslavia, Russia, Romania, and Hungary. Well known religious and political leaders hosted by the Foundation include: Romanian Chief Rabbi Moses Rosen, Rabbi Levin, Ukrainian President Leonid Kravchuk, Russian Orthodox Patriarch Aleksy II, French President Nicolas Sarkozy, and Chinese Ambassador Li Dayou. There are some born-digital media--images, sound and video recordings--in this subseries.
